schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

date.description: The date that the characterization was run on.
date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
date.title: Date

characterizes.description: The specific entity for which the characterization applies.

caption.description: A plain text description about the characterization. Characterizations for antibodies should include brief methods, expected MW, cell line(s), labels and justification for acceptance, if necessary
caption.title: Caption

comment.description: Additional information pertaining to the characterization that the submitter wishes to disclose.
comment.title: Comment

status.description: The current state of the characterization.

description: Schema for submitting antibody characterization data.
title: Antibody characterization

___status.description: The current state of the characterization.
___status.comment: Submit a status of 'pending dcc review' to indicate that DCC should begin reviewing characterization. Submit a status of 'not submitted for review by lab'  to indicate that DCC should not review the characterization.'
___status.title: Approval status
enum: not submitted for review by lab

___target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is the intended goal of the antibody.
___target.title: Target

___secondary_characterization_method.description: Secondary experimental method of the characterization, as defined in the standards document.
___secondary_characterization_method.title: Secondary method

___reviewed_by.description: Person (from DCC or antibody review panel) who reviewed the antibody characterizations associated with this antibody lot and determined the lot status
___reviewed_by.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
___reviewed_by.title: Reviewed by

___primary_characterization_method.description: Primary experimental method of the characterization, as defined in the standards document.
___primary_characterization_method.title: Primary method

___characterization_reviews.description: Characterization details reviewed by each cell type for immunoblot and immunoprecipitation primary characterizations only.
___characterization_reviews.comment: Do not submit status, it is assigned by DCC when reviewing the characterization.
___characterization_reviews.title: Primary characterization lane reviews

___biosample_term_id.comment: NTR is a new term request identifier provided by the DCC.
___biosample_term_id.title: Ontology ID

___lane_status.description: The current state of the characterization for a particular cell type.
___lane_status.title: Characterization status
